caption.p: Clot lysis effects of methanol extract of M. peguensis leaves. Clot lysis values are presented as mean ± SEM (n = 5); One-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) was followed by Dunnett’s test. * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001 were considered as significant compared with the control, where # is designated as control. SW = Saline water, SK = streptokinase and MEMP = methanol extract of M. peguensis leaves.
